about_the_game:
You are Sheridan Swan, an engineering prodigy-turned-waitress, currently on parole. Your days are spent at Room and Pillar, your restaurant-prison, selling counterfeit designer goods when you’re not taking lunch orders or arguing with the automata chefs. Arcology Security hasn’t caught up with you yet, but they aren’t the only ones watching.

Take a brief visit to the world of XVTM in this free gameplay demo, and see if the future of 2989 is everything you imagined it would be.

content_descriptors.notes: XVTM contains explicit violence, alcohol and fictitious drug use, nudity and sexual themes, and profanity.

short_description: The abyss awaits. Descend into a minimalist visual novel about a girl in the future, and guide her through branching conversations, microgames, and explorable locations. Make friends with criminals, drink too much at dinner, or relax in a spa. Whatever happens, it was your choice.
